content:
I've updated your schedule with the additional details:

* Every Tuesday and Thursday, 7 pm - 10 pm: Rehearsals at the local community theater
* Every Saturday morning: Dance classes at the dance studio near your house
* Sundays, 2 pm - 5 pm: Set construction at the theater's workshop
* Fridays, 5 pm - 8 pm: Volunteering at the box office
* April 5th: Costume fittings at the theater's costume department
* April 12th: Script reading session with the cast at the director's house (TIME TBD - REMINDER: Check with director for time)
* April 19th: Costume fittings at the theater's costume department

I've added a reminder for you to check with the director about the time for the script reading session on April 12th.

It's looking like you have a busy schedule ahead of you! Is there anything else you'd like to add or any changes you need to make?
